content:
# We have successfully harvested 20 iron ore, bringing our inventory to `{'coal': 12, 'iron-ore': 21, 'iron-plate': 5}`.
# This gives us a sufficient amount of iron ore to keep all furnaces operational.

# Next, we should distribute the iron ore to the furnaces to ensure they can continue smelting.
# We will insert 5 iron ore into each of the four furnaces.

for furnace in get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace}):
    insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 iron ore into each furnace.

# After that, let's check the updated inventory and the statuses of the furnaces once more.
print(f"Updated Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Furnace statuses: {[inspect_inventory(furnace) for furnace in get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})]}")
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
